extracted_rules.rule: Lot size and building size regulation

Conditions.Mandatory: Building size must be based on a percentage of the lot area

extracted_rules.rule: Minimum & maximum lot sizes by zone

Conditions.Mandatory: New lots must meet minimum and maximum size criteria

Explicit deviations: Where underlying lot lines must be removed to eliminate non-conformities and results in no net loss of housing
Where an adjacent substandard lot of less than 25' in width is combined with another lot and results in no net loss of housing
Where the resultant number of lots increases or stays the same and results in no net loss of housing

Conditions.Mandatory: Substandard lots must meet specified criteria
Special regulations must be followed for substandard lots
